snippet: A top official with New York City’s agency that develops affordable housing was arrested, along with six others on Thursday, and accused of scheming to obtain as much as $2 million in kickbacks from contractors and developers.
lead_paragraph: A top official with New York City’s agency that develops affordable housing was arrested, along with six others on Thursday, and accused of scheming to obtain as much as $2 million in kickbacks from contractors and developers.

headline.main: The Case of Wendell Walters et. al.
